resources:
Diakôluô Version dev-0.3.0 - Antonin LOUBIÈRE - GPL 3 Title Default description, a description can be very long. When I say very long, it\'s because a description can become very long. But I think I can do less long but it\'s needed to the demo. Created the $1%s at $2%s Last modification the %1$s at %2$s You have done %d tests General Columns Answer Play Select the number of questions: Select the number of column shown: %d/%d (%d columns) validate Continue (Skip) %.2f/20 %.2f/%.2f Restart Main menu Description Delete test Are you sure to delete this test : \"%s\" ? Cancelcheck Delete Edit The name of the test can\'t be blank A test with this name already exist. Error Warning Add answer Add column %s: Column type: Export List of tests \"%s\" has been deleted close Welcome Welcome on Diakôluô ! To start using Diakôluô, you need to set some settings.\n\nDiakôluô is an open source project under the GNU Public License 3.0. Source code is available on GitHub. Accept and continue Note: you can change this in settings at any point Allow the send of crash report for development purpose only. Allow the send of anonymous non-sensible data for development purpose only. Settings Settings Privacy Next Previous %1$d/%2$d New Create new column Do you want to create a new column ? Create Create new Answer Do you want to create a new answer ? Select export file type: All features may not be available in this format ! Save number of test done Save column name at the top of the file Save column type at the top of the file Separator: Export error An error occur during the exportation. The file may not work. The test has been successfully exported Import Import error An error occur during the importation. The test hasn\'t been added. Name of the test Load column name at the top of the file Load column type at the top of the file File preview: Test Column %d An error occur during the importation. Check if it is the correct separator. The test hasn\'t been added. Reset Reset stats Are you sure do reset all statistics (number of test done…) Case sensitive Remove useless spaces Allow auto completion No option - List empty Options: Add an option Option Up Down Can be asked during a test Can be reveal during a test A right answer will give %1$s point(s), not answering will give %2$s and a wrong answer will give you %3$s point(s). Score point(s) A positive number is required A valid number is required Score method: Score method: %s Right answer: Wrong answer: Skipped answer: A wrong answer will give more points than a right answer. A skipped answer will give more point than a right answer. A wrong answer will give more points than a skipped answer.
This test doen\'t give score %s Default value (edit):
Loading Can\'t load the test. Editable test You haven\'t finish to edit \"%s\". Do you want to continue edit it ? Test unsaved All changes aren\'t save and they will be lost if you quit. quit %f Not gate Invert the result of a condition. Condition The description to invert True A condition that is always true. Equals Test if a answer is equals to the value. Answer skipped Test if the user has skip the answer And gate Test if two condition are true. Condition A condition to test. Or gate Test if one of the two condition is true (or inclusive). Condition A condition to test. Xor gate Test if only one of the two condition is true (or exclusive). Condition A condition to test. Set score Set the score of a certain amount. Score The score to set. Add score Add an amount to the score. Score The score to add.
